realm.name: MANAGER_USER
realm.description: Usuário com permissões de admnistrador referente a uma cidade, por exemplo, prefeitos, vereadores, etc

realm.name: MODERATOR
realm.description: Usuários com permissões de administradores na plataforma, podendo fazer qualquer coisa que os outros tipos de usuários podem realizar

clients.description: Client dedicado ao permissionamento do serviço de interações dos posts
Cliente dedicado o serviço de posts de usuário
Client dedicado ao autenticação do usuário através da interface gráfica do GeoCidadao
Serviço de autenticação das chamadas recebidas pelo serviço de gerenciamento de usuários
Client para a realização de chamadas do serviço de gerenciamento de usuários para outros serviços de forma interna

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: service_account
clientScopes.description: Specific scope for a client enabled for service accounts

clientScopes.name: basic
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add all basic claims to the token

clientScopes.name: organization
clientScopes.description: Additional claims about the organization a subject belongs to

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

authenticationFlows.description: Method with which to verity the existing account
Flow to determine if any 2FA is required for the authentication
Flow to determine if the organization identity-first login is to be used
Flow to determine if the OTP is required for the authentication
Flow to determine if the authenticator that adds organization members is to be used
Flow to determine if any 2FA is required for the authentication
Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Flow to determine if the OTP should be reset or not. Set to REQUIRED to force.
Flow for the existing/non-existing user alternatives
Reauthentication of existing account
Browser based authentication
Base authentication for clients
OpenID Connect Resource Owner Grant
Used by Docker clients to authenticate against the IDP
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
Registration flow
Registration form
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something
SAML ECP Profile Authentication Flow
